text: Have seen the shapes rolling by
As I ride along the country, the shapes go a rolling by
Little Squares and Triangles and Circles go rolling by
They love to run around the countryside and look so very colorful
They love to hop and skip and jump and sing and have a times a wonderful
As I ride along the country, the shapes go a rolling by
Little Ovals and Rectangles and Diamonds go rolling by
They love to run around the countryside and look so very colorful
They love to hop and skip and jump and sing and have a times a wonderful
As I ride along the country, the shapes go a rolling by
Little Hearts and Triangles and Stars go rolling by
They love to run around the countryside and look so very colorful
They love to hop and skip and jump and sing and have a times a wonderful
See you next time, with Bob The Train!
